fr:mainmatter.fr:p: The proof of this theorem is rather delicate, and cannot be sketched here. We content ourselves with pointing out that it relies essentially on a study of equivalence relations (in the sense of categories) in the spectrum of an Artinian algebra (the study of which poses even more problems, whose solutions seems essential for the further development of the theory).
